text: Is it possible to use the Widgets to select many from a set of categories? Something similar to the Menu, but where the associated observable can hold a set of selected values.

elements.text: Is it possible to use the Widgets to select many from a set of categories? Something similar to the Menu, but where the associated observable can hold a set of selected values.

text: Ah! I can of course just do `on(s->push!(s, selected), menu.selection)`
